Description: Welcome to the stunning Decatur Building located amongst the tree lined streets of First Hill. This mid century modern building was designed by the famous, John Graham Jr., the architect who designed the Space Needle! Approaching the building you will appreciate its classy street presence. This concrete & steel building was remodeled in 2007 with the elevators & plumbing replaced in 2020. Unit 404 is a large corner 1 bdrm 1 bth unit looking out over lush green tree tops. Warm faux wood laminate flooring throughout. Remodeled kitchen-deep blue cabinets, butcher block counters, SS appliances - induction stove! Huge entry closet & bdrm closet offer ample storage. Rooftop deck, BBQ & 360° city views. Friendly on-site manager. No rental cap! Show less

Description: Like the neighborhood just outside, the homes of KODA are engaging & welcoming in every sense. Generous spaces w/ floor-ceiling windows create open, smart living spaces & ergonomically designed floorplans add a contemporary & cozy feel. Whether it be a co-working space, fully-appointed gym, exhibition kitchen or Zen garden, the KODA amenities have been designed to be a convenient extension of your home - we highly recommend taking in the view from the rooftop terrace! Description: Ideally located with a Walk Score of 98 & a Transit Score of 100, you will love this well-maintained studio at the desirable Tobira Condominiums. Located in the International District just minutes to Downtown, Pioneer Square, the Seattle waterfront, and a quick jaunt to Lumen Field & T-Mobile Park. Tobira has a well managed HOA & offers secured entry/parking w/plenty of off-site parking lots nearby for guests. This 5th floor unit is private w/lots of light, an open living space, a big walk-in closet & newer carpet, paint & blinds. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet space & bar seating. Enjoy an in-unit W/D, a big bathroom & a great storage unit. No rental cap & pet friendly! Bonus: Unit comes with a prime parking spot in secured garage. Show less

Description: Discover the most affordable condo in Seattle at First Hill's Terry Terrace, a historical, fully renovated, turn-of-the-century treasure where old world charm meets modern metropolitan pleasure. This fresh, clean & move-in ready studio features tall ceilings, wall-to-wall windows, ornate woodwork, spacious living room/bedroom, kitchen plumbed for gas stove, full-size tiled bath & walk-in closet. Ideally located just steps from Harborview & Swedish Hospitals, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery markets, public transportation & easy I5 access. Healthy HOA with super low $175 dues. Description: Welcome to the tree-lined streets of First Hill and The Decatur, a mid-century modern gem designed by Space Needle architect John Graham Jr. Spacious and light-filled, Unit 312 is the largest one-bedroom floorplan at 700 Sqft, with open living and dining spaces, plus countertop bar seating. Over-sized bedroom offers seating/office space and deep closet. Kitchen has ample prep space, SS appliances and cabinets aplenty. Large entry closet, linen closet, free laundry on every floor and rooftop deck with BBQ and 360 city views. Well kept, pet friendly building with helpful onsite building manager. SOURCE: NWMLS as Distributed by MLS Grid
Description: Bright, beautiful condo high in the Decatur, designed by Space Needle architect, John Graham! Secure, well-run, concrete/steel building offers a rooftop deck with 360° mountain & water views. Unit has gracious entry w/coat closet. Large living room w/wall of windows + great views, desk space, & large closet. Modern kitchen w/hardwoods, breakfast bar, granite counters & dining space. Sizable primary bedroom w/more views. Full bath w/midcentury charm + 2 more closets in the hallway--far more storage than your typical condo! The Decatur has recent plumbing/elevator upgrades & strong reserves. No rental cap, pet-friendly, fabulous location for city living. Bldng parking may be avail. to rent soon (buyer to verify). Ask re: $3500 lender credit. Show less
